Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: EB 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Oak Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
